nl: Prove that a group of even order contains an element of order $2 .$
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] [Fintype G]
  (hG : Even (card G)) : ∃ x, G, orderOf x = 2
candidate: ∀ [Fintype G] [DecidableEq G] [Group G] (h : Fintype.card G % 2 = 0) : ∃ g, G, orderOf g = 2
